title: Sustainable synthesis of 1,4-disubstituted and N-unsubstituted 1,2,3-triazoles using reusable ZnO-CTAB nanocrystals
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, 2,1782-1796
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00114A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Priyanuj Krishnann Hazarika, Priyanka Gogoi, Samprity Sarmah, Babulal Das, Kalyanjyoti Deori, Diganta Sarma
In this study, a sustainable and eco-friendly copper-free protocol has been developed for the regioselective synthesis of 1,4-disubstituted and N-unsubstituted 1,2,3-triazoles using a zinc-based heterogeneous catalyst.
